short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Your ultimate reading assistant powered by GPT. Compose AI summary, mind map, or just translate and explain everything you selected.
short.zh_CN: 你的基于ChatGPT的终极阅读助手。帮你撰写智能摘要、思维导图，或者翻译和解释你选择的一切内容。
short.zh_TW: 你的基於ChatGPT的終極閱讀助手。幫你撰寫智能摘要、思維導圖，或者翻譯和解釋你選擇的一切內容。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Say goodbye to lengthy articles and videos, with the power of GPT!
EasyRead.AI is your ultimate AI reading assistant. It generates high-quality summaries,  mind maps, and let AI share perspectives in fresh perspectives from different angles of thought. Also, enjoy super-fast content translation and transcript browsing. Everything at your fingertips! 🫰🏻

🚀 EasyRead.AI, your all-in-one reading efficiency tool, is now open for public beta. Register now to receive free usage quotas! 🚀

🔥 Key Features:
- One-click article summary, mind map generation, quickly grasp the essence of lengthy texts, and significantly save reading time.
- No more prompt spells, zero learning curve, step into the era of AI with ultimate efficiency.
- YouTube supported, also with transcript browsing and translate.
- Article translation, block translation, selection defination, all in one place.

🔧 How to Install:
Simply log in on the pop-up page after installing the extension, currently supporting Google account logins.

📪 Contact Us:
If you encounter any issues or have feature suggestions while using the app, feel free to contact us via email at hello@easyread.ai.
